trashday.ui.responses

Class ResponsesSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • trashday.ui.responses.ResponseHelpers
      • trashday.ui.responses.ResponsesSchedule

  • public class ResponsesSchedule
extends ResponseHelpers
    Organizes all the voice responses when talking about the Trash Day Schedule itself.
    Author:
    J. Todd Baldwin

      • askInitialConfiguration

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse askInitialConfiguration()
        Respond when user attempts first opens the application and there is no user configuration set, tell them "Welcome" and have them start a configuration dialog.
        Returns:
        Verbal "Welcome" and "Please set time zone"

      • askTimeZoneMissing

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse askTimeZoneMissing(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                               boolean withHelpCard)
        Respond when user attempts something that requires a time zone, but that time zone is missing. Tell them and give help on how to set the time zone.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        Returns:
        Verbal "Time zone not configured" and how to configure with a corresponding Card

      • askScheduleEmpty

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse askScheduleEmpty(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                             boolean withHelpCard)
        Respond when user attempts something that requires a schedule, but that schedule is empty, tell them and give help on how to add pickups to make a schedule.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        Returns:
        Verbal "Schedule empty" and how to add with a corresponding Card

        Returns:

      • respondSetTimeZoneMissingData

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondSetTimeZoneMissingData(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                          boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                          List<String> missingDataFields)
        Respond when user just tried to set time zone, but they did not give data required.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        missingDataFields - List of missing data field names
        Returns:
        Verbal, and possible card-based, help

      • respondSetTimeZoneInvalidData

                                                                                          boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                          List<String> invalidDataFields)
        Respond when user just tried to set time zone, but the time zone spoken was not understood.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        invalidDataFields - List of missing data field names
        Returns:
        Verbal, and possible card-based, help

      • respondTimeZoneUpdatedScheduleMissing

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondTimeZoneUpdatedScheduleMissing(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                                  boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                                  TimeZone timeZone)
        Respond when user just successfully updated the time zone, but there is no schedule configured.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        timeZone - TimeZone Configured time zone
        Returns:
        Verbal "Time Zone set" and "Next, [add schedule instructions]". Possible include a help card

      • respondTimeZoneUpdatedScheduleExists

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondTimeZoneUpdatedScheduleExists(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                                 boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                                 TimeZone timeZone)
        Respond when user just successfully updated the time zone and a schedule is already configured.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        timeZone - TimeZone Configured time zone
        Returns:
        Verbal "Time Zone set" and, if already in a configuration conversation, "Next, [add schedule instructions]". Possible include a help card

      • tellSchedule

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse tellSchedule(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                         boolean withDataCard,
                                                                         com.amazon.speech.speechlet.IntentRequest request,
                                                                         TimeZone timeZone,
                                                                         Schedule schedule)
        Respond when user asks to hear the schedule.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withDataCard - boolean Send user an Alexa data card with this information.
        request - IntentRequest State the next pickup(s) after this request's date/time.
        timeZone - TimeZone Time zone for user requests.
        schedule - Schedule User's weekly pickup schedule.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card listing the entire weekly pickup schedule.

      • tellOneNextPickup

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse tellOneNextPickup(boolean withDataCard,
                                                                              Date requestDate,
                                                                              TimeZone timeZone,
                                                                              NextPickups nextPickups,
                                                                              String pickupName)
        Respond when user asks to hear the next pickup(s) for a given pickup name.
        Parameters:
        withDataCard - boolean Send user an Alexa data card with this information.
        requestDate - Date State the next pickup(s) after this date/time.
        timeZone - TimeZone Time zone for user requests.
        nextPickups - NextPickups mapping pickup names to the next pickup time (after ldtStartingPoint).
        pickupName - String if non-null, state pickup time for only this pickup name. if null, state for all pickups in the schedule.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card listing the next pickup time for each schedule pickup.

      • tellAllNextPickups

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse tellAllNextPickups(boolean withDataCard,
                                                                               Date requestDate,
                                                                               TimeZone timeZone,
                                                                               NextPickups nextPickups)
        Respond when user asks to hear all the next pickup(s).
        Parameters:
        withDataCard - boolean Send user an Alexa data card with this information.
        requestDate - Date State the next pickup(s) after this date/time.
        timeZone - TimeZone Time zone for user requests.
        nextPickups - NextPickups mapping pickup names to the next pickup time (after ldtStartingPoint).
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card listing the next pickup time for each schedule pickup.

      • respondScheduleDeleted

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondScheduleDeleted(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                   boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                   boolean removed)
        Respond when the user has confirmed to delete the entire schedule.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        removed - boolean True if the schedule had entries that were actually removed by this user action.
        Returns:
        Verbal "Schedule cleared"

      • respondScheduleDeleteAllRequested

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondScheduleDeleteAllRequested(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                              boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                              Schedule schedule)
        Respond with an "Are you sure?" when user requests to delete the entire schedule.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        schedule - Schedule A schedule, which might be empty, that the user wants to be deleted.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card asking "Are you sure?"

      • respondPickupAddMissingData

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupAddMissingData(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                        boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                        List<String> missingDataFields)
        Respond when user tries to add a pickup time to the schedule but is missing essential data like pickup name, day of week, or time of day.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        missingDataFields - List which data fields are missing
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was missing and help for the schedule add commands.

      • respondPickupAddInvalidData

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupAddInvalidData(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                        boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                        List<String> invalidDataFields)
        Respond when user tries to add a pickup time to the schedule but gave invalid data for required fields like pickup name, day of week, or time of day.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        invalidDataFields - List which data fields are invalid
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was invalid and help for the schedule add commands.

      • respondPickupAddSingle

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupAddSingle(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                   boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                   String pickupName,
                                                                                   DayOfWeek dow,
                                                                                   LocalTime tod)
        Respond when user successfully adds a pickup time to the schedule.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        pickupName - String The pickup added.
        dow - DayOfWeek The pickup day of week.
        tod - TimeOfDay The pickup time of day.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with the added pickup.

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupDeleteMissingData(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                           boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                           List<String> missingDataFields)
        Respond when user tries to delete a pickup time from the schedule but is missing essential data like pickup name, day of week, or time of day.

        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        missingDataFields - List which data fields are missing
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was missing and help for the schedule delete commands.

      • respondPickupDeleteInvalidData

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupDeleteInvalidData(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                           boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                           List<String> invalidDataFields)
        Respond when user tries to delete a pickup time from the schedule but gave invalid data for required fields like pickup name, day of week, or time of day.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        invalidDataFields - List which data fields are invalid
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was invalid and help for the schedule delete commands.

      • respondPickupDeleteSingle

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupDeleteSingle(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                      boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                      String pickupName,
                                                                                      DayOfWeek dow,
                                                                                      LocalTime tod,
                                                                                      boolean removed)
        Respond when user successfully deletes a pickup time from the schedule.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        pickupName - String The pickup deleted.
        dow - DayOfWeek The pickup day of week.
        tod - TimeOfDay The pickup time of day.
        removed - boolean True if there was a pickup with this name that got deleted. False if the pickup did not exist at all.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with the deleted pickup time.

      • respondEntirePickupDeleteMissingName

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondEntirePickupDeleteMissingName(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                                 boolean withHelpCard)
        Respond when user tries to delete entire pickup from the schedule but is missing essential data like pickup name.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was missing and help for the schedule delete commands.

      • respondEntirePickupDeleteInvalidName

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondEntirePickupDeleteInvalidName(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                                 boolean withHelpCard)
        Respond when user tries to delete an entire pickup from the schedule but gave invalid data for required fields like pickup name.

        CoberturaIgnore this method since we don't have any rules that would make a pickup name invalid. However, method is written in case we find something in the future.

        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was invalid and help for the schedule delete commands.

      • respondEntirePickupDelete

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondEntirePickupDelete(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                                                                      boolean withHelpCard,
                                                                                      String pickupName,
                                                                                      boolean removed)
        Respond when user successfully deletes an entire pickup from the schedule.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao Alexa session used for storing state information for the current dialog with the user.
        withHelpCard - boolean Send user an Alexa help card if we haven't already done so in this session.
        pickupName - String The pickup deleted.
        removed - boolean True if there was a pickup with this name that got deleted. False if the pickup did not exist at all.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with the deleted pickup.
